message.content:
I need to identify the value that represents the profit an entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, the line item that represents this is "Net Profit" which appears under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities". This is the amount of profit after all operating costs, interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization have been deducted.

From the provided statement, I can see that the Net Profit is shown as -1175062.19 on 2024-01-29.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-1175062.19'} }
```
